mapper.update:
update xz_company
login_id = #{loginId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_city = #{companyCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_space = #{companySpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_location = #{companyLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_y = #{companyY,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
company_x = #{companyX,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
company_phone = #{companyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_picture = #{companyPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_intro = #{companyIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_scale = #{companyScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_nature = #{companyNature,jdbcType=INTEGER},
licence = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_state = #{companyState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_listing = #{isListing,jdbcType=INTEGER},
domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skill = #{skill,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
financing = #{financing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_company_date = #{deleteCompanyDate,jdbcType=DATE},
filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filed3 = #{filed3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_falt = #{deleteFalt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update xz_company set login_id = #{loginId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_city = #{companyCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_space = #{companySpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_location = #{companyLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_y = #{companyY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, company_x = #{companyX,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, company_phone = #{companyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_picture = #{companyPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_intro = #{companyIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_scale = #{companyScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_nature = #{companyNature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, licence = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_state = #{companyState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_listing = #{isListing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill = #{skill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, financing = #{financing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_company_date = #{deleteCompanyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed3 = #{filed3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_falt = #{deleteFalt,jdbcType=BIGINT} where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select c.company_id,count(p.postion_id) as pcount from xz_company c LEFT JOIN xz_postion p on c.company_id = p.company_id GROUP BY company_id

select
from xz_company c LEFT JOIN xz_company_welfare w on c.company_id = w.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_company_image i on c.company_id = i.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_postion p on c.company_id = p.company_id where delete_falt = 0
and c.company_id in
#{company_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and 1=0

select
from xz_company c LEFT JOIN xz_company_welfare w on c.company_id = w.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_company_product p on c.company_id = p.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_company_skill k ON c.company_id=k.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_company_domain d ON c.company_id=d.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_field f ON f.field_id=d.field_id LEFT JOIN xz_postion s ON s.company_id=c.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_company_mien m ON c.company_id=m.company_id where c.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select c.company_id,c.company_name from xz_company c WHERE c.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')and c.company_id not in ( select company_id FROM xz_shield where resume_id = #{resumeId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.insert:
insert into xz_company_follow
company_id,
member_id,
follow_time,
#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{followTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select: select company_id,follow_id,follow_time from xz_company_follow where member_id=#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(follow_id) from xz_company_follow where member_id=#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT
from xz_company where company_id in(SELECT company_id from xz_company_recommend)

select
from xz_company where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND company_state = 1
